summary.para: Specifies the direction in which reading progresses.
summary.div: Note DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION_TOP_TO_BOTTOM and DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION_BOTTOM_TO_TOP are available in Windows 8.1 and later, only.

member.name: DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION.DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION_LEFT_TO_RIGHT
member.summary: Indicates that reading progresses from left to right.

member.name: DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION.DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION_RIGHT_TO_LEFT
member.summary: Indicates that reading progresses from right to left.

member.name: DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION.DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION_TOP_TO_BOTTOM
member.summary: Note Windows 8.1 and later only.Indicates that reading progresses from top to bottom.

member.name: DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION.DWRITE_READING_DIRECTION_BOTTOM_TO_TOP
member.summary: Note Windows 8.1 and later only. Indicates that reading progresses from bottom to top.
